text: Guangzhou FC, known as Guangzhou Evergrande until 2020, is a football club which plays in China. This club has been very successful ever since Evergrande RE took over the club after a match-fixing scandal in 2009, with money flowing in. == Club honours == * Chinese Super League :Winners (8): 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2019 * China League One :Winners (2): 2007, 2010 * Chinese FA Cup :Winners (2): 2012, 2016 * Chinese FA Super Cup :Winners (4): 2012, 2016, 2017, 2018 * AFC Champions League : Winners (2): 2013, 2015 Category:Chinese football clubs Category:Guangzhou Category:1954 establishments in Asia Category:1950s establishments in China
title: Guangzhou FC
